oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-10-12 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from October 12, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer) with his Smoky Mountain Boys and June Webb, guest performer Jean Shepard, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Howdy Forrester, Pap's Jug Band, Randy Hughes, Rod Brasfield, and Bashful Brother Oswald. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. On this show John H. DeWitt Jr., president of WSM, presents Roy Acuff with an award in celebration of his twentieth anniversary performing on WSM and the Opry. It is announced that this is the 940th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pap's Jug Band; Randy Hughes; Rod Brasfield; Jean Shepard; Bashful Brother Oswald; Roy Acuff; June Webb
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Roy Acuff introduces the Randy Hughes with the Jug Band -- I'm Walkin' (Randy Hughes, Pap's Jug Band) -- Roy Acuff introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Roy Acuff) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Roy Acuff) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Roy Acuff introduces Jean Shepard -- Act Like A Married Man (Jean Shepard) -- Roy Acuff introduces Bashful Brother Oswald -- Coming From The Ball (Bashful Brother Oswald) -- Roy Acuff talks -- Before I Met You (Roy Acuff, June Webb) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Roy Acuff) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements -- Noel Hotel commercial (Grant Turner) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); United States.
